name: Silent Swordsman LV3
text: Negate the effects of your opponent's Spell Cards that target this card. During your Standby Phase, by sending this face-up card to the Graveyard, Special Summon 1 "Silent Swordsman LV5" from your hand or Deck. (You cannot activate this effect the turn this card is Normal Summoned, Special Summoned, or flipped face-up.)
